body_html:
This breaks ppc64le builds. Error is
-- Checking for [mkl - guide - pthread - m]
-- Library mkl: not found
CMake Error at cmake/Modules/FindMKL.cmake:278 (MESSAGE):
MKL library not found. Please specify library location
Call Stack (most recent call first):
cmake/Dependencies.cmake:65 (find_package)
CMakeLists.txt:187 (include)

ppc64le does not support MKL
this is for pytorch builds , please look at build log:
https://powerci.osuosl.org/job/pytorch-master-nightly-py2-linux-ppc64le/240/

body:
This breaks ppc64le builds.  Error is
-- Checking for [mkl - guide - pthread - m]
--   Library mkl: not found
CMake Error at cmake/Modules/FindMKL.cmake:278 (MESSAGE):
  MKL library not found.  Please specify library location
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  cmake/Dependencies.cmake:65 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:187 (include)

ppc64le does not support MKL
this is for pytorch builds , please look at build log:
https://powerci.osuosl.org/job/pytorch-master-nightly-py2-linux-ppc64le/240/
